form.name: Sample Form
form.attribute: Please confirm that you are not a script by entering the letters from the image.

Thanks!

Your feedback helps me make this a better module.

field.name: css
field.option:
<style type="text/css">
.formbuilderform fieldset {padding: 1em; background-color: #eee;}
.formbuilderform fieldset legend {font-weight: bold;}
.formbuilderform div {padding: 0.25em 0 0.25em 0;}
</style>

field.name: Send It
field.option:
Someone's Testing a FormBuilder Installation!

Form Name: {$sub_form_name}
Date of Submission: {$sub_date}
Server: {$sub_host}
IP address of person using form: {$sub_source_ip}
URL of page containing form: {$sub_url}
Modules you'll be using together: {$fld_13}
What will you personally be doing on your CMS MS site?: {$fld_14}
Where are you from?: {$fld_15}
Do you have any comments / feedback: {$fld_16}

field.name: Welcome!
field.option: Thanks for trying out FormBuilder. You can use this form to provide me with feedback about how you will be using Form Builder, so I can best allocate resources for future development. Thanks, ___Samuel___

field.name: What will you personally be doing on your CMS MS site?
field.option: Create Modules or Code User Tags
Port CMS MS to Ruby on Rails

field.name: Do you have any comments / feedback for me?
